name: Vivido Studio
tag_list: wedding, photography, photos, pictures, engagement, family, portrait, children, kids, bar-bat-mitzvah, love-story, boston, brookline, newton, massachusetts
overview:
Professional wedding photographer and master of portrait photography, Michael Kozlov a.k.a. Vivido Studio, is an award-winning wedding photographer who is crazy about creative wedding photography, portrait photography and his clients. Deliberated by many to be one of the best wedding photographers in Boston and Massachusetts, Vivido Studio is available for weddings in Boston, Brookline, Newton, Chestnut Hill, Cambridge, Cape Code Massachusetts and across the world.

Michael is also a Boston portrait photographer providing maternity, family, children, kids, baby, infant, pregnancy, engagement, love story and boudoir photography services to clients in Boston and all of Massachusetts. Please read our reviews at WeddingWire.com.
